author: Simple History
description:
This video was made possible thanks to everyone on the Simple History Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/simplehistory

Look at this “perfect Aryan” soldier—blue-eyed, heroic… and legally half-Jewish. Today we're exploring the twisted logic of Nazi racial ideology, the lives of Mischlinge who served in the Wehrmacht, and the remarkable story of Werner Goldberg, once hailed in Nazi propaganda as “The Ideal German Soldier.”

Check out our other Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPdc6bs3I8s6Y4QE_3g3MZw
Discord server: https://discord.gg/JZsPQXHeYC

title: Hitler's Jewish Soldier
